name: Kotmale Curd
description: Smooth & Creamy Kotmale Curd is made from 100% Sri Lankan, Fresh Cow's milk. Suitable for Vegetarians. Rs.50 cents from every 1L of fresh milk collected is contributed to a special welfare fund "Sarubima" focused on empowering Farmers children through education.      *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
